historical_shift.description: Create a forecast sensor that shifts historical data forward to predict future values.

river_ml.title: Configure RiverML Forecast
river_ml.description: Create a forecast sensor using machine learning with multiple input entities to predict output values.

data_description.input_entities: Entities to use as input features for prediction
data_description.river_model_type: SNARIMAX handles seasonal patterns with exogenous variables. Linear Regression is a simpler baseline.
